place.name: WAYFORD
place.gazetteerText: WAYFORD, a parish in Chard district, Somerset; 2½ miles SW of Crewkerne r. station. Post town, Crewkerne. Acres, 1,618. Real property, £2,353. Pop., 191. Houses, 36. The manor belongs to J. A. Pinney, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £180.* Patron, J. Alexander, Esq. The church is good. Charities, £15. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
